content: this pattern requires your favorite uterus pink yarn and a crochet hook that will give you a nice tight gauge worked in the round it is a simple and quick project i was recently diagnosed with adenomyosis and that filled me with such joy that means that the years i had suffered from ridiculous symptoms that went undiagnosed and the years of begging for my uterus to be removed only to be told no repeatedly were over finally i get to have that thing yanked out and i couldn t be happier i decided to make this in celebration so i could have a little bit of a friend join me on surgery day i figured i would make it a free fun pattern because why not best wishes and happy hooking xoxo
